scripts.styles:index: cd src && find -name \*css | grep -v index.scss | sort -r | sed 's/\(.\+\)/@import "\1";/' > index.scss
scripts.debug:build:idx: cp src/index.html debug/ && cp -R -p src/assets debug/assets
scripts.debug:build: npm run debug:build:css & npm run debug:build:app & npm run debug:build:idx
scripts.debug:watch: npm run debug:watch:css & npm run debug:watch:app & npm run debug:watch:idx
scripts.debug: npm run debug:watch & npm run debug:serve
scripts.release:app: browserify src/main.js -t [ jstify --engine lodash-micro ] -d | uglifyjs -c > release/main.js
scripts.release:css: node-sass src/index.scss --output-style compressed --source-map release/index.css.map --source-map-embed --stdout | autoprefixer > release/index.css
